name: @codebase-mcp/retrieval
description: MCP server for codebase indexing and semantic search

scripts.copy-templates: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('src/web/templates')) fs.cpSync('src/web/templates', 'dist/web/templates', {recursive: true})"
scripts.package:pkg: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/pkg/codebase-retrieval-win-x64.exe --compress GZip && npm run copy-templates-to-build
scripts.copy-templates-to-build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'dist/web/templates'; const dest = 'build/pkg/web/templates'; if (fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest), {recursive: true}); fs.cpSync(src, dest, {recursive: true}); console.log('✓ Templates copied to build/pkg/web/templates'); } else { console.error('✗ Source templates not found'); }"
